Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.reflect.fakeplayer

Class FakePlayer

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.reflect.fakeplayer.FakePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
EternaEntity
public class FakePlayer extends Object implements EternaEntity
Represents a fake player, that can be shown in the Tablist.

      Parameters:

      hatLayer - - Should use second hat layer? Note Setting a second layer requires the FakePlayer to be spawned in the world.

    • setSkin

      public FakePlayer setSkin(@Nonnull String value, @Nullable String signature)
      Sets the skin of this FakePlayer from value and signature.

      You can use something like MineSkin to get the value and the signature.

      Parameters:
      value - - Value.
      signature - - Signature.

    • setSkin

      signature - - Signature.
